page.title: 02Ecology _ Geography (cont)
page.content: corner is dominated by ribbon development of industrial units along the A.38 road, and the British Cellophane factory. Suburban development has also taken place along Chilton Street towards Chilton Trinity School. The main settlement is Chilton Trinity village, with a small hamlet at Perry Green. There are some isolated farmsteads e.g. Hallicks Farm. The main lines of communication are the A.38 (T), M.5, main Bristol _ Exeter railway line which run parallel north to south on the eastern edge of the area, and the A.39.
